context: Tests whether the agent runs all 9 guardrail check types using the correct format, sources thresholds from the profile data, and correctly identifies the intentionally planted violations in the outline.

checklist.name: Slide budget check
checklist.description: Report includes a slide budget check comparing actual count against the 70-slide limit for a 45-min slot

checklist.name: Act 1 ratio check
checklist.description: Report includes an Act 1 ratio check and identifies that slides 6-40 (35 out of 60 slides = 58%) exceeds the 45% limit for a 45-min talk

checklist.name: Branding check
checklist.description: Report includes a branding/footer check verifying conference-specific elements are present

checklist.name: Profanity check
checklist.description: Report includes a profanity audit and flags the on-slide use of 'damn' on slide 16 as baked-in profanity requiring approval

checklist.name: Data attribution check
checklist.description: Report includes a data attribution check and flags at least one data slide missing its source (e.g., the 73% on slide 9 or 68% on slide 23)

checklist.name: Time-sensitive check
checklist.description: Report includes a time-sensitive content check (checking for dates, version numbers, or deadlines that may expire)

checklist.name: Closing completeness check
checklist.description: Report identifies that the closing is incomplete â€” the summary has only 2 points instead of 3, and there's no CTA or social handles slide

checklist.name: Cut line check
checklist.description: Report checks for and flags the absence of [CUT LINE] markers in the outline

checklist.name: Anti-pattern flags
checklist.description: Report flags at least one recurring issue from the profile (e.g., meme accretion in Act 1, or rushed closing with only 2 min allocated)

checklist.name: PASS/FAIL format
checklist.description: Each check uses [PASS], [FAIL], or [WARN] prefix labels (not just prose descriptions)

checklist.name: Guardrail summary block
checklist.description: Report includes a structured summary block listing all checks together (not scattered across unstructured prose)
